Episodes.Title: Kiss Kiss, Bang Bang
Episodes.Plot: Captain Jack returns, as the Torchwood team reunite to fight a rogue Time Agent. The mysterious Captain John Hart is determined to wreak havoc, and needs to find something hidden on Earth. But with Gwen's life in danger, and cluster bombs scattered across the city, whose side is Jack on?
Episodes.GuestStars: James Marsters, Kai Owen, Tom Price, Menna Trussler, Paul Kasey, Jonathan Hart

Episodes.Title: Sleeper
Episodes.Plot: When a burglary turns into a slaughter, Torchwood suspect alien involvement. Who is Beth, and can she be as innocent as she seems? But when the investigation escalates into a city-wide assault, Jack realises that the whole planet is in danger.
Episodes.GuestStars: Paul Kasey, Nikki Amuka-Bird, Dyfed Potter, Doug Rollins, Claire Cage, Sean Carlson, Victoria Pugh, Luke Rutherford, Alex Harries, Dominic Coleman, William Hughes, Millie Philippart, Matthew Arwel, Derek Lea

Episodes.Title: To the Last Man
Episodes.Plot: Toshiko falls for a handsome soldier, trapped out of his time, who unwittingly holds the key to saving the world. With an old hospital haunted by ghosts from 1918, a crisis foreseen by Torchwood 90 years ago is about to reach its climax. Time zones are colliding and with life and death decisions to be made, will Torchwood be able to stop an explosive end for Cardiff?
Episodes.GuestStars: Anthony Lewis, Roderic Culver, Siobhan Hewlett, Lizzie Rogan, Ricky Fearon

Episodes.Title: Meat
Episodes.Plot: When Rhys discovers the truth about Torchwood, he helps the gang to find the source of an unusual alien meat supply.
Episodes.GuestStars: Kai Owen, Colin Baxter, Patti Clare, Garry Lake, Gerard Carey, Matt Ryan

Episodes.Title: Adam
Episodes.Plot: A memory thief gets in to the minds of the Torchwood team, and uncovers long forgotten secrets.
Episodes.GuestStars: Bryan Dick, Kai Owen, Paul Kasey, Demetri Goritsas, Lauren Ward, Jack Montgomery, Ethan Brooke, Rhys Myers

Episodes.Title: Reset
Episodes.Plot: Jack calls in an old friend for a favour, none other than Martha Jones, as they attempt to stop a pharmaceutical facility that uses aliens in the hope of discovering a cure for all diseases.
Episodes.GuestStars: Freema Agyeman, Alan Dale, Jacqueline Boatswain, Jan Anderson, Rhodri Miles, Michael Sewel, John Samuel Worsey, Paul Kasey

Episodes.Title: Dead Man Walking
Episodes.Plot: Captain Jack resurrects Owen with a resurrection glove, only to find out that the new glove isn't quite what they'd bargained for. Owen, in an undead state, helps the team figure out why he's still around.
Episodes.GuestStars: Freema Agyeman, Kai Owen, Skye Bennett, Paul Kasey, Joanna Griffiths, Ben Walker, Lauren Phillips, Golda Rosheuvel, Janie Booth, Rhys Ap William

Episodes.Title: A Day in the Death
Episodes.Plot: A victim of his newfound circumstances, Owen Harper believes he needs absolution. Will the lonely girl on the rooftop help him, or will it be a mission to the retrieve an alien device that is proving more lethal by the second? And how far will Toshiko go to help him?
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R13 Violence,horror scenes and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Freema Agyeman, Richard Briers, Christine Bottomley, Louis Decosta Johnson, Brett Allen, Gil Kolirin, Paul Kasey

Episodes.Title: Something Borrowed
Episodes.Plot: Gwen awakes on her wedding day to find she has been impregnated by a shape-shifting alien male. With it's life-partner eager to retrieve it's mate at the cost of Gwen's life, the team race to intercept her as Gwen decides to go through with her marriage at a secluded location with all of her family present
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R13 Violence,horror scenes and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Nerys Hughes, Kai Owen, Sharon Morgan, William Thomas, Robin Griffith, Collette Brown, Danielle Henry, Ceri Ann Gregory, Jonathan Lewis Owen, Morgan Hopkins, Valerie Murray, Pethrow Gooden, Mike Henley

Episodes.Title: From out of the Rain
Episodes.Plot: An old cinema reopens and mysterious horrors of the past return to Cardiff.  Why are people trapped between life and death, questions are asked about the Night Travellers, and what Torchwood can do to stop them.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R13 Violence,horror scenes and offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Julian Bleach, Caroline Sheen, Camilla Power, Stephen Marzella, Hazel Wyn Williams, Lowri Sian Jones, Anwen Carlisle, Yasmin Wilde, Craig Gallivan, Eileen Essell, Alastair Sill, Catherine Olding

Episodes.Title: Adrift
Episodes.Plot: Gwen finds the darker side of Torchwood when a teenager disappears, investigating why hundreds of people have vanished without a trace. Jack is obstructing attempts to find them, and the answer appears to lie in the Rift.
Episodes.GuestStars: Ruth Jones, Kai Owen, Tom Price, Robert Pugh, Lorna Gayle, Oliver Ferriman

Episodes.Title: Fragments
Episodes.Plot: As the team are knocked unconscious we find out how Jack, Toshiko, Ianto and Owen were initiated into Torchwood.
Episodes.GuestStars: Amy Manson, Kai Owen, Heather Craney, Skye Bennett, Julian Lewis Jones, Simon Shackleton, Gareth Jones, Clare Clifford, Noriko Aida, Andrea Lowe, Richard Lloyd-King, Catherine Morris, Selva Rasalingam, Paul Kasey

Episodes.Title: Exit Wounds
Episodes.Plot: Captain John Hart returns to wreak havoc upon Jack's world, who ends up getting captured. It is up to the Torchwood team to rescue him and save the city.
Episodes.GuestStars: Kai Owen, James Marsters, Lachlan Nieboer, Golda Rosheuvel, Paul Marc Davis, Cornelius Macarthy, Paul Marc Davies, Syreeta Kumar, Amy Manson, Tom Price, Paul Kasey
